name: Snaggle The Whale
description:
Ever wondered what it must be like for a Blargian Snagglebeast to be a Marine Biologist? Me either. 

This is the game of tacticality as you, the player, attempts to nurse a whale back to full health by stuffing new, fresh organs where they belong. Navigate your way to obtaining your Marine Biology license as one of the most nefarious bosses from Ratchet and Clank.

Drag the whale parts on the left side to the whale in the correct order, in order to raise his health bar back to green.
